resources.string: Large global resolver operated by Google.
Large global resolver operated by Cloudflare.
Large global resolver from IBM and Packet Clearinghouse. Blocks malicious domains.
Global DNS filtering provider. Blocks malicious domains.
Server in Austria operated by a non-profit privacy group.
Server in the Netherlands, operated by an open-source DNS software company.
Operated by xTom and other international hosting providers. Uses Cloudflare\'s CDN.
Server in Japan operated by an ISP.
Server in Taiwan operated by the .tw domain registry.
The server is in the UK, operated by a British website hosting company.
Served from the UK and Switzerland by a British hosting and networking company.
Server in London, UK, operated by a British ISP.
Server in Nice, France, operated by a French non-profit promoting free culture and ethics.
Operated by a Swiss-German association for civil rights online, using servers in Switzerland, Germany or Austria.
Server in Helsinki, Finland, operated by a German non-profit service provider.
Large global resolver owned by Cisco.
Operated by an IT services company in London and Bulgaria.
Operated by the Canadian Internet Registration Authority.
